mapper.insert: insert into new_member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile, profileAttached) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile}, #{profileAttached})
insert into member_profile_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, memberId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select * from new_member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
